alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Kingman; Lincoln; Reno; Rice; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 3:05AM CDT until April 22 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Russell, Lincoln, Barton, Ellsworth, Rice, Reno and Kingman Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 10 PM CDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from this evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could blow down large trees limbs and powerlines. Sporadic power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Secure outdoor objects. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Barton; Ellsworth; Kingman; Lincoln; Reno; Rice; Russell
